data.actual_result: The bottom of descender letters is cut-off
data.expected_result: The full body of letters visible
data.short_description: Bottom of descender letters is cut-off in Audit Log entries
data.steps_to_repro: - Set your Chat Font Scaling to 90 & Zoom Level to 100 - Create a server - Go into its Server Settings -> Moderation - Set the Verification Level to High - Go into the Audit Logs and extend the entry for the Verification Level change - Observe the bottom of the "g" in "High"
